description:
“A couple of things have changed,” Brooks said with a shy smile. “I’ve been exploring my sexuality a little more...”

“So you’re gay!”

He laughed. “Yeah!”

It had been over a year since I’d seen him, but I was glad he was back.

“Well I’m glad you sorted things out,” I said. “Now let’s put that huge cock of yours to work.”

Jayden got kind of wide eyed. He’d heard the talk and he was definitely curious. He’s become a lot more of a bottom lately.

“I decided to try it out,” he said. “And I liked it, and now here I am, back!”

I was amazed that he was able to take Brooks’ dick. That boy is seriously hung!
title: Brooks & Jayden: Bareback
